üí∞# Personal-Finance-Tracker

A simple and intuitive web-based finance management app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This application helps users track their income and expenses, visualize financial data in real time, and set savings goals efficiently.

üöÄ Features

üìä Income & Expense Tracking ‚Äì Log transactions and monitor your financial health. 
üìà Real-Time Visualizations ‚Äì Interactive charts powered by Chart.js for clear insights. 
üéØ Savings Goal Tracking ‚Äì Set and track savings goals to improve budgeting habits.
üíæ Local Storage Integration ‚Äì Data persists across sessions with real-time updates.
üì± Responsive UI ‚Äì Mobile-friendly, scrollable transaction history for easy navigation.
üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Data Visualization: Chart.js
Storage: Local Storage API
